description: For a clever way to use up leftover Easter chocolates, make these chocolate chip cookies. Perfect with a side of milk.
name: Chocolate Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drop spoonfuls onto baking trays, leaving space for spreading. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until golden. Cool on trays for 5 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack.
